jcr:content.jcr:title: NAACP Image Award for Outstanding Drama Series

contentheadline.headline: NAACP Image Award for Outstanding Drama Series

contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} The [[NAACP Image Award]] winners for '''Outstanding Drama Series''': ''(Prior to 1995, the award was for "Outstanding Drama Series, Mini-Series or Television Movie")'' <!-- If anybody can find more info on this, *please* add it. --> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year ! Television Series <!-- |- | 1988 | ''?'' |- | 1989 | ''?'' |- | 1990 | ''?'' --> |- | 1991 | ''[[The Women of Brewster Place (TV miniseries)|The Women of Brewster Place]]'' |- | 1992 | ''[[In the Heat of the Night (TV series)|In the Heat of the Night]]'' |- | 1993 | ''[[In the Heat of the Night (TV series)|In the Heat of the Night]]'' |- | 1994 | ''[[I'll Fly Away (TV series)|I'll Fly Away]]'' |- | 1995 | ''I'll Fly Away'' |- | 1996 | ''[[New York Undercover]]'' |- | 1997 | ''New York Undercover'' |- | 1998 | ''[[Touched by an Angel]]'' |- | 1999 | ''Touched by an Angel'' |- | 2000 | ''Touched by an Angel'' |- | 2001 | ''[[City of Angels (2000 TV series)|City of Angels]]'' |- | 2002 | ''[[Soul Food (TV)|Soul Food]]'' |- | 2003 | ''Soul Food'' |- | 2004 | ''Soul Food'' |- | 2005 | ''[[Law & Order]]'' |- | 2006 | ''[[Grey's Anatomy]]'' |- | 2007 | ''Grey's Anatomy'' |- | 2008 | ''Grey's Anatomy'' |- | 2009 | ''Grey's Anatomy'' |- | 2010 | ''[[Lincoln Heights (TV series)|Lincoln Heights]]'' |- |2011 | ''Grey's Anatomy'' |- | 2012 | ''[[Law & Order: Special Victims Unit]]'' |- | 2013 | ''[[Scandal (TV series)|Scandal]]'' |} ==Facts & Stats== These stats represent the drama series with the most nominations and wins as of 2012 ceremony. *Total Wins: {| class="wikitable" border="1" |- ! width="100"| Rank ! width="100"| 1st ! width="100"| 2nd ! width="100"| 3rd ! width="100"| 4th ! width="100"| 5th |-align=center | Artist | "Grey's Anatomy" | "Touched by an Angel" | "Soul Food"<br>"New York Undercover" | "E.R." | "I'll Fly Away" |-align=center | Total Wins | 17 wins | 13 wins | 7 wins | 6 wins | 5 wins |} *'''Most Nominations''' *In 2012, "Grey's Anatomy" official became the most nominated Drama Series in Image Award history with 35 nominations. {| class="wikitable" border="1" |- ! width="100"| Rank ! width="100"| 1st ! width="100"| 2nd ! width="100"| 3rd ! width="100"| 4th ! width+"100"| 5th |-align=center | Artist | "Grey's Anatomy" | "E.R." | "Soul Food" | "Law & Order" | "Touched by an Angel" |-align=center | Total Nominations | 41 nominations | 34 nominations | 30 nominations | 23 nominations | 17 nominations |} *'''Multiple Nominations''': This is the total nominations for each series that has earn more than one nomination. <br> *'''2 nominations''' **"Boardwalk Empire" **"K-Ville" **"Commander & Chief" **"Kevin Hill" <small>1 win</small> **"Lost" <small>1 win</small> **"Under One Roof" **"Undercovers" **"In the Heat of the Night" <small>2 wins</small> **"Nurse Jackie" **"The First Family" **"House of Lies" <br> *'''3 nominations''' **"Scandal" <small>2 wins</small> **"The Good Wife" (<small>1 win</small>) **"The Ladies No. 1 Detective Agency" **"Cold Case" (<small>1 wins</small>) **"Gideon's Crossing" **"413 Hope St." **"Army Wives" **"Close to Home" <small>1 win</small> **"Men of a Certain Age" <small>1 win</small> **"In Treatment" <br> *'''4 nominations''' **"Heroes" **"N.Y.P.D. Blue" **"Third Watch" <small> 3 wins</small> **"NCIS: Los Angeles" (<small>3 wins</small>) <br> *'''5 nominations''' **"HawthoRNe" (<small>1 win</small>) **"CSI: Miami" (<small>1 win</small>) **"City of Angels" (<small>3 wins</small>) **"I'll Fly Away" <small>5 wins</small> **"The L Word" **"Without a Trace" <br> *'''6 nominations''' **"True Blood" **"Ally McBeal" **"Chicago Hope" <br> *'''7 nominations''' **"24" **"Any Day Now" **"Oz" **"The Shield" <br> *'''8 nominations''' **"The Unit" (<small>1 win</small>) **"Southland" (<small>3 wins</small>) <br> *'''9 nominations''' **"Boston Public" (<small>3 wins</small>) **"A Different World" (<small>9 wins</small>) **"CSI: New York" (<small>3 wins</small>) **"Private Practice" <small>2 wins</small> <br> *'''11 nominations''' **"Lincoln Heights" (<small>2 wins</small>) **"The Practice" (<small>1 win</small>) <br> *'''12 nominations''' **"House" (<small>3 wins</small>) <br>*'''13 nominations''' **"Law & Order: SVU" (<small>3 wins</small>) <br> *'''15 nominations''' **"The Wire" **"Homicide: Life on the Streets" **"New York Undercover" <small>7 wins</small> <br> *'''17 nominations''' **"Touched by an Angel" (<small>13 wins</small>) <br> *'''23 Nominations''' **"Law & Order" (<small>4 wins</small>) <br> *'''30 nominations''' **"Soul Food" (<small>7 wins</small>) <br> *'''34 nominations''' **"E.R." (<small>6 wins</small>) <br> *'''41 nominations''' **"Grey's Anatomy" (<small>17 wins</small>) {{NAACP Image Awards}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Naacp Image Award For Outstanding Drama Series}} [[Category:NAACP Image Awards]]
